title: Do modern day Egyptians still use innovation more than technology to make amazing structures? - Quora

response.answer_text: Shalom Presently? Innovations? Egypt? what you talk about? They hardly copy innovations, but even these are not the last technologies. I think that the UN must take all 3rd world countries and start teach them that the 21st century is not the 15th. It will take a long while. they will never reach these days, but at least they will make some advance from the middle days. I didn’t aim just to Egypt. I mean all countries. It is a must and asap. This must be the UN job and to be controlled very strictly. Rima
